mapper.select: select * from (select row_number() over(order by item_class desc) rnum,item_code,item_name,item_price,item_class,item_grade,item_img,item_gender from item where upper(item_gender)!=#{playerGender} and item_grade='common') where rnum between #{startNo} and #{endNo}

select * from (select rownum,item_code,item_name,item_price,item_class,item_grade,item_img,item_gender from item where upper(item_gender)!=#{playerGender} and item_class=#{itemClass} and item_grade='common') where rownum between #{startNo} and #{endNo}
select player_ruby from player where player_nickname=#{playerNickname}
select item_price from item where item_code=#{itemCode}
select pi_index from player_item where player_nickname=#{playerNickname} order by pi_index
